文献ID: STP1467-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_14th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: Historically, in commercial reactors, Zircaloy-2, Zircaloy-4 and Zr-1Nb alloys have been used as material for fuel assembly components, while $\mathbf { Z } \mathbf { r } { - } 2 . 5 \mathbf { N } \mathbf { b }$ materials have been used for pressure tubes.

文献ID: STP1467-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_14th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: During the 1980's and $1 9 9 0 ^ { \circ } { \mathrm { s } }$ , the increased fuel element corrosion observed in the "hot" Swiss and German PWR plants prompted the PWR fuel vendors to replace the Zircaloy-4 cladding material with more corrosion resistant materials.

文献ID: STP1467-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_14th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: This situation was the driving force for the development of the various PWR corrosion resistant Zr-Nb materials and the Zircaloy materials with low tin contents that are commercially available today.

文献ID: STP1467-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_14th Volume_003_chunk1
证据片段: The most favorable alloy system is zronu-niobium, because tofer lexbily n processing tins.trenghof the binary allys can be improved by additions of tin, which, in combination with low levels of iron, provide corrosion resistancein lithium hydroxide solutions.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Adjustment of the chemical composition within ASTM limits enables generalized corrosion resistance to be enhanced and irradiation growth to be minimized.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: The optimum seems to be reached for a final treatment at the highest possible temperature compatible with the stress-relieved state, corresponding to an average precipitate size and ΣA.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Moreover, by adding anneals upstream in the process, a further increase in this ΣA no longer seems to have a significant effect on generalized corrosion.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: Finally, extensive efforts have been employed in the pilgering, surface preparation (outside diameter polishing, flush-pickling), and examination method (UT, EC) leading to a sizable improvement in SCC resistance and to a reduction in scatter for finished tubes.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_020_chunk5
证据片段: The result of these optimizations has been implemented in the current AFA-2G, that shows that under irradiation a 30% corrosion gain is reached after three cycles, without degrading creep strength or growth.
测试类型: in-reactor corrosion test, creep test, growth test

证据片段: The intrinsic effect of tin on generalized corrosion resistance under irradiation was also confirmed on this occasion.
